meaning_str.bing:
n. 石油；原油；燃油；润滑油
v. 给…加润滑油
网络. 油润滑；机油；加油

油；原油；石油；润滑油；食用油；油类产品；燃油；燃料油；基础油；精油；润滑剂；（绘画用）油彩；防护油
给…加润滑油；加油；上油；使顺畅；涂抹油料以保护或使光亮

1.en: Copper oil lantern is made of a distinctive image of the little lamp and a huge component.
1.cn: 喀麦隆铜烟斗灯由一个形象鲜明的小人和一支巨大的灯管组成。

2.en: Crude oil continued to go on Friday, American cotton plunged, short-term PTA were expected to rally continuing turbulence.
2.cn: 上周五原油继续攀高，美棉大跌，预计短期PTA将延续震荡反弹行情。

3.en: Using some oil-based pencils from my makeup kit, I began to sketch Eichmann's face on the only paper I had: my guidebook.
3.cn: 我从化妆盒里拿出几枝油笔，在一本旅行指南上给他画脸部素描，这是我唯一能找到的纸。

0.en: Some light soy sauce, some groundnut oil.

1.en: The wok is nice and hot. A little bit of oil. You can use groundnut oil or vegetable oil.
1.cn: 锅热后，倒入一些油，用花生油或植物油都可以。

2.en: But we did bring you holy oil from…
2.cn: 但我们给您带来了圣油...

3.en: I've got here some ground nut oil. You can use vegetable oil, sunflower oil.
3.cn: 往锅内倒入一点花生油，也可以选用菜籽油或葵花油。

4.en: Wok on, oil in. Now, the oil is nice and hot, we can add the meatballs.
4.cn: 起锅，倒油。现在油热了，我们放入肉丸。

5.en: So in with some corn oil. Okay. Give that a good swirl. This is really simple, right?
5.cn: 倒点玉米油，晃一圈锅中的油，这很容易，对吧？

6.en: Set all but two tablespoons of oil aside for the sauce.

7.en: Wok on, oil in, and cut up the dofu into small slices.

8.en: Lovely. And in with a little bit of oil. While that's getting nice and hot, I'm gonna marinate the pork.
8.cn: 非常好，倒点油。在加热油的同时，我要腌渍猪肉。

9.en: And some soy and some oil, and just give that a good mix.
9.cn: 再加点酱油和油，好好搅拌一下。

10.en: You know when the wok's hot enough, when you start to see a little bit of smoke just coming off the surface of the oil and sometimes you can see the oil glisten as well.
10.cn: 油表面开始冒出一点白烟时，你就知道锅已经热得差不多了，有时候也会看到油开始发亮。

11.en: So, wok lovely and hot. In with some groundnut oil. About a tablespoon or two.
11.cn: 锅已经烧热了。倒入花生油，大约一到两汤匙。

12.en: A hot and sour soup base gotta have the hot, so it gotta have the chilli. Oil into the wok.
12.cn: 酸辣汤底要有辣味，所以得放辣椒。放一些油。

13.en: You can take some caster oil, there's eating spicy foods. Great. We will do all of those.
13.cn: 你可以喝麻子油，吃辣的食物。我们全部都愿意。

14.en: Oil in. Once it's nice and smoking, in with the egg. Now I'll just swirl this around a little bit.
14.cn: 放油，烧热冒烟了之后，放蛋液。把锅稍微转一转。

15.en: Spoon the oil over the top to help brown them. Put the brown meatballs in an ovenproof dish.
15.cn: 把油淋到肉丸上，令其充分受热。把炸成金黄的肉丸放到烤盘里。

16.en: Now to cook the marinated beef. Wok on, oil in. Wok is ready. It's smoking. In with the beef.
16.cn: 现在炒腌好的牛肉。放上锅，倒些油，锅热了，冒烟了，放入牛肉。

17.en: In with about a tablespoon, for two of groundnut oil. And this is my second store cupboard ingredient.
17.cn: 在锅里倒入一到两汤匙花生油，这是我的第二种厨房必备调料。

18.en: Fantastic. And then for fragrance and smokiness, some bacon, just diced. Wok on, oil in.
18.cn: 很好，现在为了增加烟熏风味，加一点刚刚切碎的培根。架起锅，倒进油。

19.en: So now we work for The Hulk? That's what we're doing? Why do I smell baby oil?
19.cn: 我们现在为绿巨人卖力了? 那就是我们的工作？我怎么闻到一股婴儿润肤油的味道?
